{T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast a Dragon spell or an Omen spell.
{4}, {T}, Sacrifice this land: Search your library for a Dragon card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

rare.name: Mistrise Village
rare.oracle_text:
This land enters tapped unless you control a Mountain or a Forest.
{T}: Add {U}.
{U}, {T}: The next spell you cast this turn can't be countered.

mythic.name: Ugin, Eye of the Storms
mythic.oracle_text:
When you cast this spell, exile up to one target permanent that's one or more colors.
Whenever you cast a colorless spell, exile up to one target permanent that's one or more colors.
+2: You gain 3 life and draw a card.
0: Add {C}{C}{C}.
−11: Search your library for any number of colorless nonland cards, exile them, then shuffle. Until end of turn, you may cast those cards without paying their mana costs.

mythic.name: Elspeth, Storm Slayer
mythic.oracle_text:
If one or more tokens would be created under your control, twice that many of those tokens are created instead.
+1: Create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.
0: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. Those creatures gain flying until your next turn.
−3: Destroy target creature an opponent controls with mana value 3 or greater.

mythic.name: Smile at Death
mythic.oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, return up to two target creature cards with power 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. Put a +1/+1 counter on each of those creatures.

mythic.name: Taigam, Master Opportunist
mythic.oracle_text: Flurry — Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, copy it, then exile the spell you cast with four time counters on it. If it doesn't have suspend, it gains suspend. (At the beginning of its owner's upkeep, they remove a time counter. When the last is removed, they may play it without paying its mana cost. If it's a creature, it has haste.)

mythic.name: Rot-Curse Rakshasa
mythic.oracle_text:
Trample
Decayed (This creature can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)
Renew — {X}{B}{B}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a decayed counter on each of X target creatures. Activate only as a sorcery.

mythic.name: Dracogenesis
mythic.oracle_text: You may cast Dragon spells without paying their mana costs.

mythic.name: Stormscale Scion
mythic.oracle_text:
Flying
Other Dragons you control get +1/+1.
Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. Copies become tokens.)

mythic.name: Craterhoof Behemoth
mythic.oracle_text:
Haste
When this creature enters, creatures you control gain trample and get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of creatures you control.

mythic.name: All-Out Assault
mythic.oracle_text:
Creatures you control get +1/+1 and have deathtouch.
When this enchantment enters, if it's your main phase, there is an additional combat phase after this phase followed by an additional main phase. When you next attack this turn, untap each creature you control.

mythic.name: Betor, Kin to All
mythic.oracle_text:
Flying
At the beginning of your end step, if creatures you control have total toughness 10 or greater, draw a card. Then if creatures you control have total toughness 20 or greater, untap each creature you control. Then if creatures you control have total toughness 40 or greater, each opponent loses half their life, rounded up.

mythic.name: Call the Spirit Dragons
mythic.oracle_text:
Dragons you control have indestructible.
At the beginning of your upkeep, for each color, put a +1/+1 counter on a Dragon you control of that color. If you put +1/+1 counters on five Dragons this way, you win the game.

mythic.name: Death Begets Life
mythic.oracle_text: Destroy all creatures and enchantments. Draw a card for each permanent destroyed this way.

mythic.name: Dragonback Assault
mythic.oracle_text:
When this enchantment enters, it deals 3 damage to each creature and each planeswalker.
Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters, create a 4/4 red Dragon creature token with flying.

mythic.name: Jeskai Revelation
mythic.oracle_text: Return target spell or permanent to its owner's hand. Jeskai Revelation deals 4 damage to any target. Create two 1/1 white Monk creature tokens with prowess. Draw two cards. You gain 4 life.

mythic.name: Neriv, Heart of the Storm
mythic.oracle_text:
Flying
If a creature you control that entered this turn would deal damage, it deals twice that much damage instead.

mythic.name: Perennation
mythic.oracle_text: Return target permanent card from your graveyard to the battlefield with a hexproof counter and an indestructible counter on it.

mythic.name: Shiko, Paragon of the Way
mythic.oracle_text:
Flying, vigilance
When Shiko enters, exile target nonland card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard. Copy it, then you may cast the copy without paying its mana cost. (A copy of a permanent spell becomes a token.)

mythic.name: Teval, Arbiter of Virtue
mythic.oracle_text:
Flying, lifelink
Spells you cast have delve. (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting those spells pays for {1}.)
Whenever you cast a spell, you lose life equal to its mana value.

mythic.name: Ureni, the Song Unending
mythic.oracle_text:
Flying, protection from white and from black
When Ureni enters, it deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or planeswalkers your opponents control, where X is the number of lands you control.

mythic.name: Mox Jasper
mythic.oracle_text: {T}: Add one mana of any color. Activate only if you control a Dragon.
